law.catch_line: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated....

text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Dental plan" means a contractual arrangement for dental services.
"Dental plan organization" means a person that provides directly, arranges for, or administers a dental plan on a prepaid or postpaid individual or group capitation basis.
"Dental service" means a service included in practicing dentistry as defined in § 4-101 of the Health Occupations Article.
"Enrollee" means an individual or dependent of the individual who is enrolled in a dental plan.
"Evidence of coverage" means a contract or certificate that is issued to an enrollee and that specifies the dental services to which the enrollee is entitled.
